name: realtime-project-setup
description: 1. Install Node 2. `npm init -y` Setup Node Environment -> Create package.json file 3. create `index.html` 4. create two folders :     * __src__ : development     * __dist__ : production 5. `tsc --init` create __tsconfig.json__ file 6. create `index.ts` file in src 7. modify __tsconfig.json__ file -> __"ourDir":"./dist"__ 8. Run the Application on watch mode -> `tsc -w`    * It generate `JS` file of `TS` in dist folder 9. Link generated `JS` file in dist folder to `index.html` 10. Start the Application (index.html) on live-server using __vscode extension live server__. 11. `.gitignore` for untract the node_modules  12. Optional -> use third-party-package      * `npm install lite-server`     * Lightweight development only node server that serves a web app, opens it in the browser, refreshes when html or javascript change     * Start : `lite-server`
